# k-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                    | Type                                         | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The colour of button to display can be plain, primary or danger this is edited | `"danger" \| "plain" \| "primary"`           | `'plain'` |
| `type`   | `type`    | The button format to display can be basic, raised, outline or flat             | `"basic" \| "flat" \| "outline" \| "raised"` | `'basic'` |
